nhc_headline: ...HONE WEST-NORTHWESTBOUND WELL NORTH OF JOHNSTON ATOLL...
summary:
...HONE WEST-NORTHWESTBOUND WELL NORTH OF JOHNSTON ATOLL...
 As of 11:00 AM HST Wed Aug 28
 the center of Hone was located near 20.6, -168.9
 with movement WNW at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.
